scripts.build: flow && (rm distr/*; true) && babel source --out-dir distr && cd distr && (for f in $(find | grep -E '.js$'); do if grep @flow ../source/$f >/dev/null; then cp ../source/$f $f.flow; fi; done) && cd ..
scripts.go: npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.unpublishrecentbutlast: for m in $(node -e "const p=[$(npm view 2>/dev/null)][0];p&&console.log(p.versions.filter(v=>Date.now()-new Date(p.time[v])<24*3600000&&p['dist-tags'].latest!==v).map(v=>p.name+'@'+v).join('\n'))"); do npm unpublish $m; done
